alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Pontotoc; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 3:28PM CST until December 17 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Northern Pontotoc County in east central Oklahoma... Southwestern Hughes County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 415 PM CST. * At 328 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Wynnewood, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ada, Byng, Allen, Francis, Sasakwa, Vanoss and Spaulding. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
